attributes.action: Stop providing Gender Reassignment Surgery on the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: The NHS was set up to provide medical treatment for all, unfortunately, due to funding, many operations and treatments are limited. We believe that Gender Reassignment Surgery is cosmetic surgery & should not take up funding that is there to treat people that are sick & taking up valuable operation time & availability. The NHS provide many alternative treatments other than surgery, we understand that, but finances are tight and delayed surgery for cancer sufferers is unacceptable.
attributes.background: The NHS was set up to provide medical treatment for all, unfortunately, due to funding, many operations and treatments are limited. Gender Reassignment Surgery is cosmetic surgery & should not take up funding that is there to treat people that are sick & taking up valuable operation availability

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about availability of NHS services and treatment for individual patients are a matter for integrated care boards and individual clinicians, not the UK Government or Parliament.
